TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableCell extends System.Windows.Documents.TextElement

summary.span: 定义 中内容单元格的流内容元素。

span.span: A flow content element that defines a cell of content within a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素是直接在托管内容的唯一表元素。The element is the only table element that directly hosts content. 其他表元素 (， ， ，和) 存在来定义表的结构化的属性。Other table elements (, , , and ) exist to define the structural attributes of a table. 元素可承载一个或多个流内容元素派生自。 elements may host one or more flow content elements deriving from . 有效的内容元素包括：Valid content elements for a include: - - - - - 集合类提供用于处理的集合的工具对象。The collection class provides facilities for working with collections of objects. > [!NOTE] > 没有内置的数据绑定的内容。There is no built in data binding for the contents of a . 添加到数据绑定功能的最简单选项放置的数据绑定在你如下所示： ``The simplest option for adding data binding functionality to a is to put a data bound in your like this: ``

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };
member this.FlowDirection : System.Windows.FlowDirection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 元素中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the relative direction for flow of content within a element.

value.span: 枚举的一个成员，它指定相对流动方向。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the relative flow direction.

value.span: 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。

span.span: Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction.

value.span: 设置此属性将导致 元素的内容重新沿指示的方向流动。

span.span: Setting this property causes the contents of the element to re-flow in the indicated direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容的流方向通常对应于所表示的语言的固有流动方向。The flow direction of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语提供自然流动从右到左的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic provide examples of languages that naturally flow from right-to-left. 英语、 德语和俄语提供自然流动从左到右的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian provide examples of languages that naturally flow from left-to-right. **注意：** 此属性的值不会自动更改以匹配由操作系统使用的语言。**Note:** The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果需要使用不同的值，则默认值为，您必须自行指定。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置的属性元素 ()。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element (). [!code-xaml[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_block_flowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_block_flowdirection)] [!code-vb[BlockSnippets#_Block_FlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BlockSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_block_flowdirection)]

member this.LineHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 一个双精度值，指定行的高度（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: A double value specifying the height of line in device independent pixels.

value.span: 必须等于或大于0.0034且等于或小于160000。

span.span: must be equal to or greater than 0.0034 and equal to or less then 160000.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值"自动") 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它将更改包含文本行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 除了此属性中的行的布局受其属性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

exception.span: 当尝试将 设置为一个非正值时引发。

span.span: Raised if an attempt is made to set to a non-positive value.
